participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and enthusiastic, loves sharing her passions and connecting with others.
participant_1.background: I am a music student who is ready to start my day, but my car is acting up. My favorite band is Bon Jovi. I write children's books. I watch football with my husband and discuss our fantasy team. I listen to music in my hearse before starting my day.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Friendly and outgoing, enjoys hands-on activities and loves spending time outdoors.
participant_2.background: I love my dogs, they are the best. I enjoy spending a lot of money on my hobbies. I'm a homeowner who can fix your computer. I crashed my favorite RC car into a tree. I'm an active person who enjoys working with my hands and spending time outdoors.

content.text: Good morning! I'm a music student and ready to start my day, but my car is acting up.
Morning!  I am an active person who enjoys working with my hands and spending time outdoors.  I'm a home owner who can fix your computer. What type of music do you play?
I play drums and write children's books.  I also watch football with my husband and discuss our fantasy team.
That's cool!  I'm a big football fan too.  I just crashed my favorite RC car into a tree.  It was a bummer, but I was able to fix it.
Oh no!  I'm glad you were able to fix it.  I was actually listening to some Bon Jovi before I started my day.
Bon Jovi is great!  I love their music.  I've been spending a lot of money on my hobbies lately.  I love my dogs, they are the best.
That's awesome!  I love dogs too.  I'm a little jealous of your hobbies.  I wish I had more time to spend on mine.
You're welcome to come and hang out with me and my dogs sometime.  We could play some music or work on our hobbies together.
That sounds like a lot of fun!  I'd love to do that sometime.  Thanks for the offer!
